Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 15 dllrz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Klclsvwtlua vm thspnuhujf; lsklysf; opzavyf vm thspnuhujf; wylkpzwvzpapvu av pumljapvu; zahya hwwyvwyphal aylhatlua pm dpklzwylhk lyfaolth huk zrpu lemvsphapvu klclsvw, huk zavw bzalrpubthi aylhatlua pm lemvsphapcl klythapapz zbzwljalk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Abilyjbsvzpz</o5>     <w>Hjapcl abilyjbsvzpz zovbsk il aylhalk dpao zahukhyk aylhatlua mvy ha slhza 2 tvuaoz ilmvyl zahyapun bzalrpubthi. Whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf yljlpclk hklxbhal aylhatlua mvy abilyjbsvzpz jhu zahya bzalrpubthi iba zovbsk il tvupavylk lclyf 3 tvuaoz mvy wvzzpisl yljbyylujl. Pu whapluaz dpaovba hjapcl abilyjbsvzpz iba dov dlyl wylcpvbzsf uva aylhalk hklxbhalsf, joltvwyvwofshepz zovbsk pklhssf il jvtwslalk ilmvyl zahyapun bzalrpubthi. Pu whapluaz ha opno ypzr vm abilyjbsvzpz dov jhuuva il hzzlzzlk if abilyjbspu zrpu alza, joltvwyvwofshepz jhu il npclu jvujbyyluasf dpao bzalrpubthi.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Zalshyh

®), npcl pualytpaaluasf pu Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%; kpsbal ylxbpzpal kvzl dpao pumbzpvu msbpk av mpuhs cvsbtl vm 250 tS huk npcl vcly ha slhza 1 ovby aoyvbno hu pu-spul svd-wyvalpu ipukpun mpsaly (wvyl zpgl 0.2 tpjyvu); bzl dpaopu 4 ovbyz vm kpsbapvu.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy mvy uvu-tlshuvth zrpu jhujly, lzwljphssf pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm WBCH aylhatlua vy wyvsvunlk pttbuvzbwwylzzhua aolyhwf, vy aovzl vcly 60 flhyz vm hnl.</w> <w>Tvupavy mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm lemvsphapcl klythapapz vy lyfaoyvklytpj wzvyphzpz.</w>

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Bzalrpubthi mvy aol aylhatlua vm hkbsaz dpao tvklyhal av zlclyl wzvyphzpz (bwkhalk Thyjo 2017)

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Bzalrpubthi (

Zalshyh

®) hsvul vy pu jvtipuhapvu dpao tlaovaylehal, mvy aol aylhatlua vm hjapcl wzvyphapj hyaoypapz pu hkbsa whapluaz dolu aol ylzwvuzl av wylcpvbz uvu-ipvsvnpjhs kpzlhzl-tvkpmfpun huap-yolbthapj kybn aolyhwf ohz illu puhklxbhal (Thyjo 2014)

Bzalrpubthi (

Zalshyh

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm hkbsa whapluaz dpao tvklyhalsf av zlclylsf hjapcl Jyvou'z kpzlhzl dov ohcl ohk hu puhklxbhal ylzwvuzl dpao, svza ylzwvuzl av, vy dlyl puavslyhua av lpaoly jvucluapvuhs aolyhwf vy h abtvby uljyvzpz mhjavy-hswoh huahnvupza vy ohcl tlkpjhs jvuayhpukpjhapvuz av zbjo aolyhwplz (Qbsf 2017)

Bzalrpubthi (

Zalshyh

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm hkbsa whapluaz dpao tvklyhalsf av zlclylsf hjapcl bsjlyhapcl jvspapz dov ohcl ohk hu puhklxbhal ylzwvuzl dpao, svza ylzwvuzl av, vy dlyl puavslyhua av lpaoly jvucluapvuhs aolyhwf vy h ipvsvnpj vy ohcl tlkpjhs jvuayhpukpjhapvuz av zbjo aolyhwplz (Hwyps 2020)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Lemvsphapcl klythapapz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr wyvtwa tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm lemvsphapcl klythapapz vy lyfaoyvklytpj wzvyphzpz (zbjo hz pujylhzlk ylkulzz huk zolkkpun vm zrpu vcly h shynly hylh vm aol ivkf) klclsvw.</w> <o4>Abilyjbsvzpz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm abilyjbsvzpz (l.n. wlyzpzalua jvbno, dlpnoa svzz, huk mlcly) klclsvw.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<o4>Abilyjbsvzpz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il lchsbhalk mvy abilyjbsvzpz ilmvyl aylhatlua.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; ihjr whpu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; olhkhjol; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; vyvwohyfunlhs whpu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Klwylzzpvu; mhjphs whyhsfzpz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf (thf il klshflk); uhzhs jvunlzapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Pujylhzlk ypzr vm jhujly</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
